entry.title: vim常用命令
entry.content:
Basics

command operation
:e filename open filename for edition
:w save file
:q exit vim
:q! quit without saving
:x write file (if changes has been made) and exit
:sav filename saves file as filename
. repeats the last change made in normal mode
5. repeats 5 times the last change made in normal mode

Moving in the file

command operation
k or Up Arrow move the cursor up one line
j or Down Arrow move the cursor down one line
e move the cursor to the end of the word
b move the cursor to the beginning of the word
0 move the cursor to the beginning of the line
G move the cursor to the end of the file
gg move the cursor to the beginning of the file
L move the cursor to the bottom of the screen
:59 move the cursor to 59. replace 59 by the desired line number
20竖杠 (请原谅我这样写。。。) move the cursor to colume 20
% move the cursor to matching parenthesis
[[ jump to function start
[{ jump to block start

Cut,copy&paste

command operation
y copy the selected text to clipboard
p paste clipboard contents
dd cut current line
yy copy current line
y$ copy to end of line
D cut to end of line

entry.title: iOS视图层次管理
entry.content:
为了让某个view放到最上面，或者将某个view放到下层，经常需要使用bringSubviewToFront:和sendSubviewToBack:两个方法。

遇到的问题

设置的rootBackgroundButton用来遮盖self.view区域，但换层的时候，rootBackgroundButton被新的层覆盖，不能显示在最上面了。

出现效果如下：

修改代码，添加
[self.viewControllerContainView bringSubviewToFront:self.rootBackgroundButton]

正常了！

Java中的点语法

objective-c中的点语法

在 objective-c中 使用 对象名.成员变量 会自动调用该成员变量的set方法，而不是直接访问

objective-c中的点语法的本质是方法调用，不是直接访问成员变量。

自定义set方法内部
